lines.text: Maybe... some different blood, like the virgin's blood, is being oxygenated and circulated through his body...
Using something other than breathing and a rhythmic heart!
Like, there's a tiny air pump attached to his bloodstream, and he's lying on top of it...
And why that other blood, anyway? Why not his own?
Because, um... it's purer? Better blood? Less likely to cause problems?
